name: Playable Apple over BF Skin
description:
you know why i made this cuz i'm bored

1.B Update: Fixed Apple Sprites Axis

you can play as him in any mods like Dave and Bambi, VS NuSKY and many other mods!!!

This includes the Spritesheet Skin, 3 examples icon grids of kade engine old versions (1.5.2->older), PE/KE(1.6-newer) icon and a source FLA file!
